dcterms:description: A large-scale dataset of Reddit comments in English from communities banned for being offensive, abusive, or hateful.
dcterms:title: RAL-E

dcterms:creator: Marcos Zampieri
Shervin Malmasi
Preslav Nakov
Sara Rosenthal
Noura Farra
Ritesh Kumar
dcterms:description: This dataset contains 14,100 tweets annotated for offensive language, with messages labeled as offensive if they contain any form of unacceptable language or a targeted offense.
dcterms:title: OffensEval 2019

dcterms:creator: Tommaso Caselli
Valerio Basile
Jelena Mitrovic
Inga Kartoziya
Michael Granitzer
dcterms:description: This dataset adds a layer of abusive language annotation to the OffensEval 2019 dataset, defining abusive language as hurtful language used to insult or offend individuals or groups.
dcterms:title: AbusEval

dcterms:creator: Valerio Basile
Cristina Bosco
Elisabetta Fersini
Debora Nozza
Viviana Patti
Francisco Manuel Rangel Pardo
Paolo Rosso
Manuela Sanguinetti
dcterms:description: This dataset contains 13,000 tweets annotated for hate speech against migrants and women, defining hate speech as communication that disparages a person or group based on characteristics such as race, gender, or religion.
dcterms:title: HatEval
